tables.name: view
tables.sql: select cast(_MAP['name'] AS varchar(200)) AS "name", cast(_MAP['abv'] AS varchar(200)) AS "abv", cast(_MAP['ounces'] AS varchar(200)) AS "ounces", cast(_MAP['ibu'] AS varchar(200)) AS "ibu", cast(_MAP['style'] AS varchar(200)) AS "style", cast(_MAP['brewery_id'] AS varchar(200)) AS "brewery_id", cast(_MAP['id'] AS varchar(5)) AS "id" from "redisearch"."beers"
